title: Configure git remote for repository
description: Add a git remote (e.g., origin) and set upstream tracking for main so we can run git pull --rebase / git push and enable bd sync to remote.

title: vtt-mcp: initial epic and task graph
Document/use: research-sota recipe (how to run, required web extensions, seed_sources fallback)
description: Add project documentation for the research-sota Goose recipe: how to run it (CLI/Desktop), what capabilities/extensions are needed for web search/fetch, and how to use seed_sources_text/seed_sources_file fallback when no web tools are available.
